review:
My wife's blood group is B-Ve and I am B +Ve. My wife had a miscarriage at the early pregnancy. And Anti-D injection was administrated after 6 days which should  had been done within 72 hours of abortion. That was the big mistake of our life. Which caused a big problem in next pregnancy. After 6 months, we planned and visited gynecologist. She advised us to go for ICT test, which came out positive. Which means that its impossible to sustain pregnancy. It will again abort the pregnancy. We consulted with some other doctors also. They said that we had never seen this report as positive in our life. Everyone said that it might be difficult to conceive. Pray to God. Then someone suggested us to visit Dr. Seema Jain.
Me and My Wife visited Dr. Seema Jain and produced all the reports to her. She took it in very cool manner. And said us that its not a problem at all. You don't worry. At that day, we found a new ray of hope after losing hopes. She treated and always cleared all of our doubts. She used to talk like a family member. She is very nice doctor and lady as well.
We blessed with a baby girl on 03rd August 2020. And this is possible only due to Dr. Seema Jain. My words are less to thank her. Thank you very much mam.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Vaginal Itching,Adiana System,Gynae Problems,High-Risk Pregnancy Care,
review: Hello Friends my wife is a patient of Dr. Seema Jain Mam since day 1 of her pregnancy. In the sixth month of her pregnancy, she had a heavy swelling in her both lower limbs due to that she will not able to stand  her own.  After so many test conclusion came that she is loosing very high protein in Urine. Because of that swelling was increasing very fast. Simultaneously other symptoms also came in picture. She become breathless. She is not able to sleep. Her diet which very necessary for baby in stomach & her self has gone to very less. Her blood pressure start remaining on higher side. With so many complications she admitted in Max Shalimaar bagh in the first Week of her 9th month pregnancy. All team members of Dr. Seema Mam tried to make her recover from the above symptoms. But suddenly on the 15th of september 2019 mid night my wife  become completely breathless & high shivering was also there. Finally she shifted to the Medical ICU because of that. On 16th morning Dr. Seema mam arrived back from her some commitment out of Town. She rushed to the hospital after scene the symptoms, she decide to go for a sigerian as now its not possible to take more time to recover from the situation. As i had a full faith in her capabilities of doing good in such situation. I thanked the God that Dr. Seema mam is near her to treat. Finally with so many complications she did  a sigerian after all the measure which required to help her. Finally at 12.47 pm. She came to me with a good new that God blessed us a boy baby, which has a lower weight due to early coming & then shifted to Nursery care. My wife also shifted to surgical ICU. At last both came home & now Living  together at home just because of the Dr. Seema mam experience & the way of treating her patients. She is next to gGod for me & my wife. May God blessed her long & healthy life so she can help the others like me.

Very very bad experience. Their staff is pathetic, rude and bad behaviour. They don’t keep track of their responsibilities and then put it on the patient. Their focus is mostly on getting tests done, ****** ********** ** ***** **** ******* ******** Their staff member in our 2nd consultation made my husband guilty of not getting ultrasound done on given particular date (which was bcoz hospital said you can do it next day) and when dr seema said no it can be done in next few days didn’t even bother to apologise, my husband in that moment was feeling so sorry and staff hardly realised. Thereafter they missed out on informing us about different test details (telling theirs no fasting test then wasting our time while getting to know it is fasting test), not giving complete info, not taking care of applying stamp on ultrasound (again we had to take off another day from work bcoz they missed out on stamp and yet didn’t accept their mistake. Her words were “that was your work, you should have remembered” instead owning mistake. Dr seema missed on informing me about urine infection in my blood reports while I’m supposed to trust her & relax, I had to be on my toes all the time. ******* **** ** ***** ** ***** *** ****** ****** **** ********* **** *** ***** ***** *** **** ******* ******** ** ****** **** ******** ** ******* **** **** ******* Also, after results came they didn’t even bother to message or inform us about it. I consulted her for 20 weeks despite this behaviour & I finally changed my gynae ***** ****** ******** ******* ********* *** ******* **** *********

*** ***** **** ** *** *** ****** * **** **** *** . *** ******* **** ****** ** **** . I asked ques related to my report but she responded in a bad way with rude voice . She is totally unprofessional . I don't recommend you all . **** **** ****** ** ******* *** *** ********** *

Hello ,
I really want to thanx from the bottom of my heart to Dr Seema Jain .She is really wonderful dr and nice person.My case is too complicated but due to her great efforts I blessed with baby boy on feb .She is really supportive throughout my pregnancy journey and give satisfaction at every step. May God bless her with healthy and long life.Also I want to thanx Gurcharan,she is really helpful, hardworking and friendly person.May God fulfils all her dreams and blessed with all the happiness and great life ahead!

Regards
Kulvinder & Amrit Pal Singh

Dr. Seema Jain is so friendly person. I always feel
like I get plenty of time to explain my issues without
feeling rushed. And of course she does a good job and
so professional that makes me feel very comfortable.
And easy to reach on her mobile phone if anything
urgent. I feel very cared for every visit. I believe, best
advice and treatment during every visit and for every
issue. She truly cares about me. I am truly grateful.

*** ***** **** ** * **** **** ****** she treat a pacent as a friend . She always meet pacent cool & smiley . First visit my wife vardhman clinic & delivery in max max hospital . Max hospital staff is very sincerely . Dr Seema jain assistant miss gurcharan ji good she always help any time in hospital regarding admission room shifting & discharge .so I say that dr. Seema Jain & her staff is very carefully treat a pacent.  I thanks full  dr. Seema Jain & team

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Visited Max Shalimar Bagh for the delivery of my wife by Dr. Seema Jain. If I were to state the experience in one line then she is a great consultant, guides you at each and every step of pregnancy. Very friendly and cooperative in every way. Big thanks to Dr. Seema Jain for making our journey to parenthood wonderful.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Me and my wife started visiting  Dr. Seema Jain at Max Shalimar Bagh in May, 2018. From then to 12 August 2018 (day my wife blessed with a baby boy) our experience was totally awesome with her.  Her guidance throughout this period was remarkable. Her whole team including Dr Ankita was truly appriciable. Her behaviour during that period was truly amazing as she answered all queries with utmost patience. We would like to thank her and her team from core of our heart.

Seema mam is very helpful and cooperative doctor. She handled my wife's case ( normal delivery) with utmost care. 

She even responded to my wife's queries at late/odd hours. I am very thankful to her and her team.
